name: Help I'm In A Rocket And The Music's Way Loud (Also Asteroids)
name_original: Help I'm In A Rocket And The Music's Way Loud (Also Asteroids)
description:
Epilepsy warning!

THERE'S A SYNC PROBLEM WITH THE FLASH VERSION — PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE DESKTOP VERSION IF THE ASTEROIDS ARE NOT SYNCED WITH THE MUSIC!

CONTROLS:

Z - Left

Space - Center

M - Right

Working on this for the #LowRezJam

With ever-changing color palettes from COLOURLovers, and Kira's asteroid!

Check out Azureflux for more amazing music!

(Also tweet me @mikeevmm maybe?)

WIP name.
